title: Aromatherapy Heaven - Kingston, NY
description: Specialties: Aromatherapy works to help people improve their wellness with the use of essential oil's. Essential oil's can not only smell nice but can help you relax and improve your overall being. Nicole, the aromatherapist can sit down with you can go over your special needs and help you find the right essential oil blend for you.
